Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Tangla Beijing in Beijing (Xicheng), you'll be close to Capital Museum and Tiananmen Square. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Baiyun Guan and Tianning Temple Pagoda.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 380 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a memory foam bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Planning an event in Beijing? This hotel has 21528 square feet (2000 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Tangla Beijing in Beijing (Xicheng), you'll be close to Capital Museum and Tiananmen Square. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Baiyun Guan and Tianning Temple Pagoda.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Capital Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Baiyun Guan - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Tianning Temple Pagoda - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Temple of the White Dagoba - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Museum of the Chinese Revolution - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Xidan Shopping Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
South Cathedral - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Yuyuantan Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Guangji Temple - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Baoguosi Market - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Niujie Mosque - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Zhongnanhai - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Fayuan Si Buddhist Temple - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Beijing Zoo - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi

The preferred airport for Tangla Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 28.2 km / 17.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
